page.title: 20SCHOOLS AND THE COMMUNITY
page.content: The{community}makes intensive use of the{school buildings}in our area. Sunningmead First School,for example, is used 3 times a week by a{dance {group.}The{Christian Fellowship}use the school for study groups and services, and{local retired people come on Wednesdays for a{lunch club. } Staff at the school are glad that the building is used for worthwhile purposes and the headteacher is able to use the{money}from{rental charges to buy extra equipment for the school. All the groups are pleased to use a warm, modern building, but the old people are especially appreciative. They enjoy the contact with the younger generation and are pleased that they do not have to walk far, or wait for buses.{ {WILCOMBE MIDDLE & SUNNINGMEAD FIRST {SCHOOLS, TIVERTON, WROTE THESE PAGES.
